name: Foosball 2012
description:
Enjoy multiplayer foosball matches with up to 4 players, dominate the online leaderboards, or become a global champion in single-player World Tour mode.

Use PlayStation®Move motion controller for realistic and precise controls, or play with the DUALSHOCK®3 wireless controller and its innovative controls.

The Cross-Play feature will let you play against other players on both PS3™ and PlayStation®Vita, while cross-saving will let you continue playing the game on your PlayStation®Vita where you left off on PS3™!

Whether you enjoy foosball regularly or have played it only briefly before, this game’s addictiveness and competitiveness will captivate you.

- Local & Online multiplayer for up to 4 players.
- PlayStation®Move support for realistic gameplay and precise DUALSHOCK®3 wireless control.
- 9 different tables, 6 balls, and dozens of customization options.
- Full cross-compatibility with PlayStation®Vita.

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements.
